document.full_text: u.s. authorities seized georgia's supply of a drug used in executions on tuesday because of concerns about how it was imported, a move praised by death penalty opponents.
document.title: u.s. agents seize georgia execution drug supply
lines_and_colors: u.s. authorities seized georgia's supply of a drug used in executions on tuesday because of concerns about how it was imported, a move praised by death penalty opponents.
